metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5698 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - untriaged
metadata.Description:
libreadstat.a in WizardMac ReadStat 0.1.1 has a heap-based buffer over-readvia an unterminated string.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5698` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

r-cran-haven - 1.1.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: r-cran-haven package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.1-1').
